summary: A simple mod that renames most of the in-game potions to Final Fantasy potions.
descriptionHtml:
--This plugin is currently a work in progress. Some items have been renamed, while there are still others that need to be adapted. This plugin will be regularly updated.-- 

This is a simple plugin that renames most of the potions in Skyrim to their Final Fantasy counterparts. I was inspired to make this mod during my playthrough on my gaming channel, since I'm doing a full run as Lightning from Final Fantasy XIII. 

So far, these are the potions that have been renamed: 

Potion of Minor Healing - Potion 
Potion of Healing - Hi-Potion 
Potion of Plentiful Healing - X-Potion 
Potion of Vigorous Healing - Megapotion 
Potion of Extreme Healing - Elixer 
Potion of Ultimate Healing - Megalixer 

Potion of Minor Magicka - Ether 
Potion of Magicka - Dry Ether 
Potion of Plentiful Magicka - Turbo Ether 

Potion of Minor Stamina - Soma 
Potion of Stamina - Dry Soma 
Potion of Plentiful Stamina - Turbo Soma 

Potion of Cure Disease - Vaccine 
Potion of Cure Poison - Antidote 


This plugin aims to rename as many potions as possible, thus will be continuously updated. If users have recommendations for potion names, please be sure to leave comments, and I will get back to you!
author: CelestOrion
